title: EnglishPod 初级 英文播客 0031

segments.en: And today we're bringing you another great lesson about appointments.
segments.cn: 今天我们带来另一个关于预约的精彩课程。

segments.en: We've got an elementary lesson about canceling an appointment.
segments.cn: 我们有一节关于取消预约的基础课程。

segments.en: That's a really common situation sometimes.
segments.cn: 这是一种非常常见的情况。

segments.en: You have an appointment at the doctor's or something.
segments.cn: 你可能在看医生或其他地方有预约。

segments.en: And you have to cancel it.
So we're going to learn some great language to help you cancel appointments today.
segments.cn: 所以今天我们将学习一些很好的语言来帮助你取消预约。

segments.en: Let's go straight to the dialogue, then.
segments.cn: 那么我们直接进入对话吧。

segments.en: We're going to be listening as Samantha and Angela have a phone conversation and Angela is trying to cancel an appointment.
segments.cn: 我们将听Samantha和Angela的电话对话，Angela试图取消一个预约。

segments.en: And it's going to be a little bit fast in the beginning, but when we come back, we will explain all the great vocabulary.
segments.cn: 一开始会有点快，但我们回来时会解释所有的好词汇。

segments.en: I'm just calling about our meeting today.
segments.cn: 我只是打电话关于我们今天的会议。

segments.en: I wonder, is it possible to reschedule our appointment in the afternoon?
segments.cn: 我想知道，下午能否重新安排我们的预约？

segments.en: I have a bit of an emergency that I need to take care of.
segments.cn: 我有点紧急的事情需要处理。

segments.en: It shouldn't be too much of a problem.
I hope it doesn't inconvenience you too much.
segments.cn: 希望这不会给你带来太多不便。

segments.en: It's just this thing came up and... Angela, you know what?
segments.cn: 只是这件事突然出现了……Angela，你知道吗？

segments.en: I can't make it to our meeting either.
segments.cn: 我也不能参加我们的会议。

segments.en: Why don't we postpone it to tomorrow afternoon at the same time?
segments.cn: 我们为什么不把它推迟到明天下午同一时间？

segments.en: See that lady over there who's trying on a red leather jacket?
segments.cn: 看到那位试穿红色皮夹克的女士了吗？

segments.en: No wonder she told me she couldn't make it to the meeting.
segments.cn: 难怪她告诉我她不能参加会议。

segments.en: Oh no, I think she saw me.
Okay, we have some really interesting words that you probably listen to in this dialogue, so let's start with language takeaway.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们在这个对话中有一些非常有趣的词汇，所以让我们开始语言要点。

segments.en: Today on language takeaway, we're bringing you three words.
segments.cn: 今天的语言要点，我们带来三个词。

segments.en: When you reschedule an appointment, you change it for another day or time.
segments.cn: 当你重新安排一个预约时，你是把它改到另一天或另一个时间。

segments.en: The second word that we have is inconvenience.
segments.cn: 我们的第二个词是不便。

segments.en: So to inconvenience someone is to... Make things not convenient for that person.
segments.cn: 所以让某人感到不便就是……让事情对那个人不方便。

segments.en: So to make things a little bit difficult or to make things a little bit uncomfortable.
segments.cn: 让事情变得有点困难或不舒服。

segments.en: We have some examples of the word postpone that will help you to understand its meaning a little bit better.
segments.cn: 我们有一些推迟这个词的例子，可以帮助你更好地理解它的意思。

segments.en: Since Robert is late again, we have to postpone the meeting.
segments.cn: 由于Robert又迟到了，我们必须推迟会议。

segments.en: I'm sorry, Simon, but your vacation has been postponed until next month.
segments.cn: 对不起，Simon，但你的假期已推迟到下个月。

segments.en: Unfortunately, the flight will be postponed.
segments.cn: 不幸的是，航班将被推迟。

segments.en: Okay, so basically postpone is to delay.
segments.cn: 好吧，基本上推迟就是延迟。

segments.en: Make it at a later time.
Okay, some great words there, and we can listen to our dialogue a second time at a slower speed.
segments.cn: 好吧，这里有一些很好的词汇，我们可以以较慢的速度再听一遍对话。

segments.en: I'm just calling about our meeting today.
segments.cn: 我只是打电话关于我们今天的会议。

segments.en: I wonder, is it possible to reschedule our appointment in the afternoon?
segments.cn: 我想知道，下午能否重新安排我们的预约？

segments.en: I have a bit of an emergency that I need to take care of.
segments.cn: 我有点紧急的事情需要处理。

segments.en: It shouldn't be too much of a problem.
I hope it doesn't inconvenience you too much.
segments.cn: 希望这不会给你带来太多不便。

segments.en: It's just this thing came up and...
segments.cn: 只是这件事突然出现了……

segments.en: I can't make it to our meeting either.
segments.cn: 我也不能参加我们的会议。

segments.en: Why don't we postpone it to tomorrow afternoon at the same time?
segments.cn: 我们为什么不把它推迟到明天下午同一时间？

segments.en: See that lady over there who's trying on a red leather jacket?
segments.cn: 看到那位试穿红色皮夹克的女士了吗？

segments.en: No wonder she told me she couldn't make it to the meeting.
segments.cn: 难怪她告诉我她不能参加会议。

segments.en: so in this dialogue, we had some really great phrases that we should look at in Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 在这个对话中，我们有一些非常好的短语，我们应该在流利度构建器中查看。

segments.en: We have three phrases for you today in Fluency Builder, and the first one is so common, it's a great phrase.
segments.cn: 今天我们在流利度构建器中有三个短语，第一个是非常常见的，这是一个很好的短语。

segments.en: So this is a very common way of saying hi.
segments.cn: 这是一种非常常见的打招呼方式。

segments.en: Right, and now the interesting thing is that many people don't know how to answer this phrase.
segments.cn: 对，现在有趣的是，很多人不知道如何回答这个短语。

segments.en: Yes, I see this all the time with my students.
segments.cn: 是的，我在我的学生中经常看到这种情况。

segments.en: So if you say what's up, you should say... Not much.
segments.cn: 所以如果你说怎么了，你应该说... 没什么。

segments.en: Alright, so the next time someone tells you what's up, now you know what to answer.
segments.cn: 好吧，下次有人问你怎么了，现在你知道该怎么回答了。

segments.en: Okay, our second phrase is can't make it.
segments.cn: 好的，我们的第二个短语是不能去。

segments.en: We use this phrase when we want to say I cannot attend.
segments.cn: 我们使用这个短语来表示我无法参加。

segments.en: So if you're having a party today, I say, oh, I'm sorry, I can't make it.
segments.cn: 所以如果你今天有一个派对，我会说，哦，抱歉，我不能去。

segments.en: So Marco, we've got a meeting today at three o'clock.
segments.cn: 所以马尔科，我们今天三点有个会议。

segments.en: Our last word for Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 我们的最后一个词用于流利度构建器。

segments.en: This is a great way of giving an excuse for why you can't make it.
segments.cn: 这是一个很好的借口，说明你为什么不能去。

segments.en: So I can't make it today because this thing came up like something... Something happened.
segments.cn: 所以我今天不能去，因为发生了这个事情，就像... 发生了什么。

segments.en: Yeah, let's listen to a few examples of this phrase so we can see how it's used in the wild.
segments.cn: 是的，让我们听几个这个短语的例子，这样我们可以看到它是如何在实际中使用的。

segments.en: This thing came up at work and I had to stay to take care of it.
segments.cn: 这件事在工作中发生了，我不得不留下来处理。

segments.en: Okay, great example and I guess it's perfectly clear now.
segments.cn: 好的，很好的例子，我想现在已经完全清楚了。

segments.en: So let's listen to our dialogue a third time and now we're ready to understand everything.
segments.cn: 所以让我们第三次听我们的对话，现在我们准备理解一切。

segments.en: I'm just calling about our meeting today.
segments.cn: 我只是打电话来询问我们今天的会议。

segments.en: I wonder, is it possible to reschedule our appointment in the afternoon?
segments.cn: 我想知道，下午能否重新安排我们的约会？

segments.en: I have a bit of an emergency that I need to take care of.
segments.cn: 我有点紧急的事情需要处理。

segments.en: It shouldn't be too much of a problem.
I hope it doesn't inconvenience you too much.
segments.cn: 我希望这不会给你带来太多不便。

segments.en: It's just this thing came up and... Angela, you know what?
segments.cn: 只是发生了这个事情，安吉拉，你知道吗？

segments.en: I can't make it to our meeting either.
segments.cn: 我也不能参加我们的会议。

segments.en: Why don't we postpone it to tomorrow afternoon at the same time?
segments.cn: 我们为什么不把它推迟到明天下午同一时间？

segments.en: See that lady over there who's trying on a red leather jacket?
segments.cn: 看到那位正在试穿红色皮夹克的女士了吗？

segments.en: No wonder she told me she couldn't make it to the meeting.
segments.cn: 难怪她告诉我她不能参加会议。

segments.en: Oh no, I think she saw me.
So Erika, have you ever cancelled an appointment like this under false pretenses?
segments.cn: 所以埃里卡，你有没有在虚假借口下取消过约会？
所以是为了一个假理由？

segments.en: Well, I may not have told my boss so I can't make it to a meeting because this thing came up and then I really was going shopping.
segments.cn: 嗯，我可能没有告诉我的老板我不能参加会议，因为发生了这个事情，然后我真的去购物了。

segments.en: Well, you know, in Ecuador, soccer is a really big thing.
segments.cn: 嗯，你知道，在厄瓜多尔，足球是一个非常重要的事情。

segments.en: So when we were playing in the World Cup, Ecuador was playing and... Not you, but... Well, no, like the Ecuadorian soccer team.
segments.cn: 所以当我们在世界杯上比赛时，厄瓜多尔在比赛... 不是你，而是... 嗯，不，像厄瓜多尔足球队。

segments.en: I cancelled an appointment because I was going to go watch the game.
segments.cn: 我取消了一个约会，因为我要去看比赛。

segments.en: Yeah, I mean, it was like the first time we were ever in the World Cup.
segments.cn: 是的，我的意思是，那是我们第一次参加世界杯。

segments.en: And, you know, my boss didn't really put up much of a fight because I guess he also wanted to go watch the game.
segments.cn: 而且，你知道，我的老板并没有太多反对，因为我想他也想去看比赛。

segments.en: So very similar to the events in this dialogue.
segments.cn: 所以与这个对话中的事件非常相似。

segments.en: I guess that's kind of the inspiration behind it.
segments.cn: 我想这就是背后的灵感。

segments.en: All right, guys, I hope you found some of these phrases helpful and useful.
segments.cn: 好吧，大家，希望你们觉得这些短语有帮助和实用。

segments.en: And remember, if you have any questions about anything you heard in today's lesson, please visit our website at EnglishPod.com.
segments.cn: 记住，如果你对今天课程中听到的任何内容有疑问，请访问我们的网站 EnglishPod.com。

segments.en: There you'll be able to find more resources and also a large community to interact with.
segments.cn: 在那里你可以找到更多资源，还有一个大型社区可以互动。
